author: Bill Buden
comment: Beautiful watchface for Christmas. Long battery life.

author: Kelsey Stringer
comment: Time and text is not centered. Looks terrible in dim mode. Still one of my faves though. Very festive!

author: Lisa Simmons
comment: I bought this watch face hoping to get the garland with the chrismas lights and I am not able to change it from the Santa to the garland....update: I updated my review due to the quick response from the creator. Thank you! I love it!

reply.author: BoostApp
reply.content:
Hello, Lisa!
Hold long tap on your wear, and choose settings, now u can see the menu -  choose a theme and tap on the garland. I hope these help u. 
Need help? Contact us now! wearables@boost.solutions ...update: Happy holidays!

title: Satisfied now!

author: Wissam M. Khoury
comment: Night and day mode should flip automatically based on timing or sunset / sunrise. Can this be done developer? Am I missing something?
title: Nice

author: Canadian Time-Vapers
comment: Huawei watch This designer makes fabtastic designs everyone ive enjoyed and still use

author: marcelo vieira
comment: this one is my favorite. I love the lights blink.

author: jen jen
comment: Such a wonderful watchface for Christmas... Loving it..make an app like this for android phones..please... ...(Christmas fever) started

reply.author: BoostApp
reply.content: Thanks! Not at all, it’s flashing only in active mode so have to be enough for the whole day. Anyway, you can switch off the garland.

title: Thank you!!!

author: rob kimball
comment: Really great watch face and great animation... Can you add an analog face with the animation?
title: Beautiful

author: malice Barbosa
comment: I enjoyed it. It didn't fit any style but did look great for ugly christmas sweater parties.
title: Good fit for the month

author: Dan Spanos
comment: Very nice watch face, but can you please add the option to use night mode as the ambient mode instead of the current one? I would definitely give you 5 stars if that happened!

author: Licinio Madureira
comment: This is the best christmas clock ever  thanks it's perfect the way it is I recommend to every one o wants a Christmas clock.very good work congrats
title: Very very good

author: vito cominio
comment: Very clean and very cool. Could you maybe add a battery meter? Could be candy cane colored (:

reply.author: BoostApp
reply.content: Thanks! We will look to find a place for it.

title: Nice!

author: IAN BLADUELL
comment: Requesting different font options for time. Other than that great looking.
title: Great let's looking but

author: Eric Peterson
comment: Looks awful in Dim Mode, poor performance
